skillList.skillDesc: Drop a deployable Barrier that blocks incoming projectiles. Zane and his allies can shoot through the Barrier, dealing increased Gun Damage. Pressing F or G while Barrier is active picks up and holds the Barrier, but the size and bonuses are decreased.
Zane gains increased Action Skill Cooldown Rate. This bonus is based on the amount of shields he has. The more percent full, the greater the bonus.

skillTiers.tierDesc: Action Skill Cooldown Rate: Up to +7%
Action Skill Cooldown Rate: Up to +14%
Action Skill Cooldown Rate: Up to +21%
Action Skill Cooldown Rate: Up to +28%
Action Skill Cooldown Rate: Up to +35%

skillList.skillDesc: Zane gains increased Maximum Shield Capacity.
Zane gains improved Shield Recharge Rate and Shield Recharge Delay.
Whenever Zane or an ally touches the Barrier, they gain increased Movement Speed and Reload Speed for a few seconds.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Reload Speed: +20%
Movement Speed: +11%
Duration: 8 seconds after moving away from Barrier

skillList.skillDesc: Whenever Zane scores a Critical Hit on an enemy, there's a chance they will be Slowed. This effect stacks until the target is Frozen.
Whenever Zane is damaged, he gains Damage Resistance against that damage type.
Zane gains Health Regeneration. The lower his shield is, the higher the bonus.

skillTiers.tierDesc: Health Regeneration: up to +1.0% of Max Health / sec
Health Regeneration: up to +2.0% of Max Health / sec
Health Regeneration: up to +3.0% of Max Health / sec
Health Regeneration: up to +4.0% of Max Health / sec
Health Regeneration: up to +5.0% of Max Health / sec

skillList.skillDesc: Zane and his allies gain Health Regeneration, increased Reload Speed, and greatly improved Shield Recharge Delay while near his Barrier. The lower his health, the more health is regenerated.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Health Regeneration: up to 4% of Max Health/sec while near Barrier
Shield Recharge Delay: -33%
Reload Speed: +11%

skillList.skillDesc: While Zane's shields are active, he gains increased Gun Damage and Accuracy. This bonus is based on the amount of shields he has. The more percent full, the greater the bonus.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Gun Damage: up to +20%
Accuracy: up to +33%

skillList.skillDesc: Zane's Barrier becomes a dome, covering all sides.
Zane and allies near the Barrier gain increased Gun Damage for a few seconds after the Barrier takes damage.
Elemental Status Effects applied to Zane have reduced duration.
Kill Skill. Whenever Zane kills an enemy, they create a Cryo Nova, dealing damage to all nearby enemies. This skill has a short cooldown.
Zane gains resistance to non-elemental damage. Kill Skill. After killing an enemy, all elemental damage Zane takes is converted to non-elemental damage.
Enemies that touch the Barrier take Shock Damage and are staggered.
Whenever Zane damages a frozen enemy with his weapon, he gains some of that damage back as health.

Whenever Zane Freezes an enemy, his shield instantly begins recharging. If Zane's shields are already full, he regenerates health for a few seconds. If Zane's health is already full, his Action Skill Cooldowns and Durations are immediately reset.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Health Regeneration: up to 3% max health / sec
Regeneration Duration: 3 seconds

skillList.skillDesc: Zane gains increasing Accuracy and Handling. The longer his shield is full, the greater the bonus.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Accuracy: +2.0% per second
Handling: +2.4% per second
Max Stacks: 15

Accuracy: +4.0% per second
Handling: +4.8% per second
Max Stacks: 15

Accuracy: +6.0% per second
Handling: +7.0% per second
Max Stacks: 15

skillList.skillDesc: Zane's Barrier gains the effects of his currently equipped Shield Mod. Additionally, shield effects are applied to all allies near the Barrier. Bonuses to Zane are reduced.

skillTiers.tierDesc: Throw that on the big screen.

skillList.skillDesc: Send into battle an automated SNTNL drone that continually flies through the environment and attacks enemies with its Machine Guns. Pressing F or G while SNTNL is active causes it to attack the enemy under Zane's crosshairs, if any.
Kill Skill. After killing an enemy, Zane gains increased Movement Speed for a few seconds.
Zane gains increased Weapon Swap Speed. The next shot fired after swapping weapons deals Bonus Cryo Damage.
Zane's Gun Damage is increased while moving. The quicker he moves, the greater the Gun Damage bonus.

skillTiers.tierDesc: Gun Damage: +4.0% at default walk speed
Gun Damage: +8.0% at default walk speed
Gun Damage: +12.0% at default walk speed
Gun Damage: +16.0% at default walk speed
Gun Damage: +20.0% at default walk speed

skillList.skillDesc: Converts SNTNL's primary weapons to Cryo Damage.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Converts SNTNL Weapon Damage to Cryo
Drone Damage: -20%

skillList.skillDesc: Zane gains increased Reload Speed. Kill Skill. After killing an enemy, Zane's Reload Speed is increased for a few seconds.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Reload Speed: +2.9%
Reload Speed: +4.0% after kill
Duration: 8 seconds

Reload Speed: +5.7%
Reload Speed: +7.0% after kill
Duration: 8 seconds

Reload Speed: +8.3%
Reload Speed: +11.0% after kill
Duration: 8 seconds

Reload Speed: +10.7%
Reload Speed: +14.0% after kill
Duration: 8 seconds

Reload Speed: +13.0%
Reload Speed: +17.0% after kill
Duration: 8 seconds

skillList.skillDesc: SNTNL will occasionally drop a free grenade based on Zane's current grenade mod while attacking enemies.
Kill Skill. After killing an enemy, Zane's weapons gain Life Steal for a few seconds.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Life Steal: 2% of damage dealt
Duration: 8 seconds

Life Steal: 4% of damage dealt
Duration: 8 seconds

Life Steal: 6% of damage dealt
Duration: 8 seconds

Life Steal: 8% of damage dealt
Duration: 8 seconds

Life Steal: 10% of damage dealt
Duration: 8 seconds

skillList.skillDesc: SNTNL occasionally shoots out a beam of Radiation that weakens enemies and buffs Zane. For every weakened enemy, Zane’s Movement Speed and Fire Rate are increased. Weakened enemies have decreased Movement Speed and Attack Speed.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Fire Rate: +2.00% per enemy
Movement Speed: +6.00% per enemy
Damage: 4 / second
Duration: 12 seconds
Cooldown: 8 seconds

skillList.skillDesc: All of Zane's Kill Skills gain increased effect and duration.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Kill Skill Duration: +7 seconds
Kill Skill Bonus: +25.0%

skillList.skillDesc: SNTNL emits a static field that sends a Shock Beam to nearby enemies, draining their shields and replenishing Zane’s.
SNTNL adds a rocket pod to its primary weapons, allowing it to shoot rockets as well as machine guns.
Kill Skill. After killing an enemy, Zane gains increased Fire Rate for a few seconds.
Kill Skill. After killing an enemy, Zane’s next five shots all have a chance to fire an additional projectile.

Hold down F or G while SNTNL is deployed to paint a target area. SNTNL fires a missile barrage at that area, and if an enemy is killed, SNTNL's duration is reset. This can only be used once per Action Skill use.
Kill Skill. Killing an enemy increases Zane's Action Skill Duration. This skill has diminishing returns.

skillTiers.tierDesc: Duration Return: up to 4.0% max duration
Duration Return: up to 8.0% max duration
Duration Return: up to 12.0% max duration

skillList.skillDesc: Activating an Action Skill automatically activates all of Zane's Kill Skills.
Spawn a Digi-Clone of Zane. This Clone stays in place, but distracts and fires at enemies. Pressing F or G while the Clone is active causes Zane and the Clone to swap places.
Whenever one or more of Zane's action skills are active, he gains increased Gun Damage for each active action skill.

skillTiers.tierDesc: Gun Damage: +4% per active action skill
Gun Damage: +8% per active action skill
Gun Damage: +12% per active action skill
Gun Damage: +16% per active action skill
Gun Damage: +20% per active action skill

skillList.skillDesc: Zane and his Digi-Clone gain increased Magazine Size.
Zane gains increased Action Skill Duration for every active Action Skill.

skillTiers.tierDesc: Action Skill Duration: +3% per active action skill
Action Skill Duration: +6% per active action skill
Action Skill Duration: +9% per active action skill
Action Skill Duration: +12% per active action skill
Action Skill Duration: +15% per active action skill

skillList.skillDesc: Whenever Zane swaps places with his Clone, a Cryo Nova is triggered around Zane and his Clone.
Kill Skill. Whenever Zane kills an enemy, he and his Digi-Clone receive increased Gun Damage and gain Health Regeneration for a few seconds.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Gun Damage: +3%
Health Regeneration: 0.5% of Missing Health / sec
Duration: 8 seconds

Gun Damage: +6%
Health Regeneration: 1.0% of Missing Health / sec
Duration: 8 seconds

Gun Damage: +9%
Health Regeneration: 1.5% of Missing Health / sec
Duration: 8 seconds

Gun Damage: +12%
Health Regeneration: 2.0% of Missing Health / sec
Duration: 8 seconds

Gun Damage: +15%
Health Regeneration: 2.5% of Missing Health / sec
Duration: 8 seconds

skillList.skillDesc: The Digi-Clone throws a copy of Zane's current grenade mod when it is first activated. If the Digi-Clone is killed, it drops a free grenade. Kill Skill. Killing an enemy while the Digi-Clone is active gives the Clone a chance to throw a grenade.
The first shot fired from Zane's gun has a chance to also fire a grenade. This skill has a short cooldown

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Grenade Chance: up to 4%
Cooldown Time: 8 seconds

Grenade Chance: up to 8%
Cooldown Time: 8 seconds

Grenade Chance: up to 12%
Cooldown Time: 8 seconds

Grenade Chance: up to 16%
Cooldown Time: 8 seconds

Grenade Chance: up to 20%
Cooldown Time: 8 seconds

skillList.skillDesc: Whenever the Clone takes damage, Zane's shield is restored by a portion of that damage.
Whenever Zane swaps places with his Clone, his shield immediately begins recharging.

skillTiers.tierDesc: I can do this all day.

skillList.skillDesc: Enemies are more likely to target the Clone for a few seconds after it’s summoned and after swapping places.

Hold down F or G to end the action skill early. When Zane’s Action Skill is ended, the Clone explodes, dealing Splash Damage to all nearby enemies. The more Action Skill time remaining, the greater the damage.
Kill Skill. After killing an enemy, Zane gains Grenade Regeneration for a few seconds.
Press F or G during Fight for Your Life if Digi-Clone is active to destroy the clone and immediately gain a Second Wind with full health.

skillTiers.tierDesc: Max Health Restored: 100% of Max Health

skillList.skillDesc: Whenever one or more of Zane's Action Skills are active, he gains increased Movement Speed for each active Action Skill.

skillTiers.tierDesc: Movement Speed: +4% per active action skill
Movement Speed: +8% per active action skill
Movement Speed: +12% per active action skill

skillList.skillDesc: If Zane takes health damage while the Clone is active, a portion of that damage is shared to his Clone instead.
Zane and his Digi-Clone gain a chance to ignore bullets. This chance is increased for a few seconds after activating an Action Skill. This effect stacks.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Ignore Bullet Chance: 2%
Additional Ignore Bullet Chance: +3%
Duration: 8 seconds

Ignore Bullet Chance: 4%
Additional Ignore Bullet Chance: +6%
Duration: 8 seconds

Ignore Bullet Chance: 6%
Additional Ignore Bullet Chance: +9%
Duration: 8 seconds

skillList.skillDesc: Whenever Zane summons his Digi-Clone, it consumes up to 3 grenades. For every grenade consumed, the Digi-Clone gains increased Gun Damage, Max Health, Fire Rate, Reload Speed, and Digi-Clone Duration.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Gun Damage: +20% per grenade
Max Health: +81% per grenade
Fire Rate: +5% per grenade
Reload Speed: +31% per grenade
Digi-clone Duration: +25.0% seconds per grenade

skillList.skillDesc: Zane deals Bonus Shock Damage to enemies that aren't targeting him.
The Clone is equipped with a copy of Zane's Current Weapon when activated. Swapping places with the Clone causes Zane and his clone to gain increased Gun Damage.
